player.name: ffplay
player.args:
export SDL_AUDIODRIVER="alsa"; export AUDIODEV="plughw:1,0"; /usr/bin/echo "{0}" | while read url do VIDEOFILE=`echo "{0}" | grep -Eo '(http|https)://[a-zA-Z0-9./?=_@%-]*\.(mkv|mp4|avi|flv)'` M3U8=`echo "{0}" | grep -Eo '(http|https)://[a-zA-Z0-9./?=_@%-]*\.(m3u8)'` XFORWARD=`echo "{0}" | grep -Eo '(http|https)://[a-zA-Z0-9./?=_@%-]*\.(m3u8)\|X-Forwarded-For=[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}'` XFORWARDIP=`echo "$XFORWARD" | grep -Eo '[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}'` USEREF=`echo "{0}" | grep -Eo '(http|https)://[a-zA-Z0-9:0-9./?=_-]*\.(mkv|mp4|m3u8|avi)\|User-Agent=[a-zA-Z]*/[0-9]{1,1}\.[0-9]{1,1}(.*)\&Referer=(http|https)://[a-zA-Z0-9./?=_-]*(/|\.html)'` USERAGENT=`echo "$USEREF" | grep -Eo 'User-Agent=[a-zA-Z]*/[0-9]{1,1}\.[0-9]{1,1}(.[^&]*)'` REFERER=`echo "$USEREF" | grep -Eo 'Referer=(http|https)://[a-zA-Z0-9./?=_-]*(/|\.html)' | sed 's/Referer=//'`
case "$url" in "$VIDEOFILE") ffplay -hide_banner -loglevel error -fs "$VIDEOFILE" ;; "$M3U8") ffplay -hide_banner -loglevel error -fs "$M3U8" ;; "$XFORWARD") ffplay -hide_banner -loglevel error -fs -headers 'X-Forwarded-For: '"$XFORWARDIP"''$'\r\n' "$M3U8" ;; "$USEREF") ffplay -fs -user-agent "$USERAGENT" -headers 'Referer: '"$REFERER"''$'\r\n' "$VIDEOFILE" ;; *) ffplay -hide_banner -loglevel error -fs "$VIDEOURL" ;; esac done
